value_claims.claim_title: AI-driven automated method building for mass spectrometry
value_claims.claim_description: PRM Conductor software uses automated intelligence to build highly effective targeted acquisition methods from discovery data, eliminating manual optimization and improving productivity in method development for biomarker verification.
value_claims.source_quote: PRM Conductor aids in the generation of targeted-MS2 and MS3 assays...Precursors are filtered by whether they have at least a certain number of qualifying transitions, typically three for peptides and two for small molecules.
value_claims.quote_location: How AI speeds method creation and optimization section
value_claims.attribution_evidence: The software explicitly uses automated intelligence to filter transitions, create assays with visualization, and export instrument methods based on user-defined templates.

value_claims.claim_title: Automated collision energy optimization eliminates manual calibration
value_claims.claim_description: Normalized Collision Energy (NCE) automatically compensates for mass dependency and estimates collision energies, bypassing the need for per-transition optimization required by triple quadrupole mass spectrometers.
value_claims.source_quote: NCE bypasses the need for optimization per precursor-to-product ion transition performed by a triple quadrupole mass spectrometer which takes much longer to perform, multiplies the experimental cost due to replicate injections
value_claims.quote_location: How AI speeds method creation and optimization section
value_claims.attribution_evidence: NCE uses automated intelligence to estimate collision energies without manual optimization, directly reducing time and experimental costs.

value_claims.claim_title: Dynamic AGC expands quantitation dynamic range
value_claims.claim_description: Dynamic automated gain control maintains constant ion count and high data quality by regulating charges/ions per spectrum, expanding dynamic range from base three orders of magnitude by multiplying it with gate linearity range.
value_claims.source_quote: the ability to vary the injection time expands the dynamic range of quantitation, from a base range given by just the storage and detector saturation limits and multiplies it by the gate linearity range
value_claims.quote_location: How AI streamlines data acquisition section
value_claims.attribution_evidence: The system uses automated intelligence to regulate ion accumulation in real-time, directly improving data quality and expanding measurement range.

value_claims.claim_title: Adaptive RT eliminates missing data and sample re-runs
value_claims.claim_description: Adaptive RT dynamically manages PRM acquisition by updating methods in real-time to adjust for LC perturbations, nearly eliminating risk of missing data and the need for costly sample re-runs.
value_claims.source_quote: Adaptive RT, dynamically manages PRM acquisition, which means you'll nearly eliminate the risk of missing data while maximizing target capacity. Missing data requires you to re-run samples, costing time and money.
value_claims.quote_location: How AI streamlines data acquisition section
value_claims.attribution_evidence: The system continuously updates and modifies methods autonomously to manage unexpected variations, directly preventing data loss and re-runs.

value_claims.claim_title: AI-driven workflow improves lab productivity and turnaround times
value_claims.claim_description: Stellar MS software leverages automated intelligence to boost laboratory productivity, capacity, and reputation for high-quality data with faster turnaround times across the entire discovery-to-validation workflow.
value_claims.source_quote: Stellar MS software leverage automated intelligence to boost laboratory productivity, capacity, and lab reputation for high-quality data with faster turnaround times.
value_claims.quote_location: Finally: automated intelligence without the drawbacks section
value_claims.attribution_evidence: The claim explicitly attributes productivity improvements, increased capacity, and faster turnaround to the automated intelligence capabilities of the Stellar MS software.

context_claims.claim_title: Life sciences and clinical research sector
context_claims.claim_description: Thermo Fisher operates in life sciences, specifically serving clinical and translational researchers performing biomarker verification and discovery-to-validation workflows.
context_claims.source_quote: This idea is especially true for clinical and translational researchers who perform biomarker verification.

context_claims.claim_description: The AI application supports scientific research activities, specifically method development, data acquisition, and data processing for mass spectrometry experiments.
context_claims.source_quote: the Stellar mass spectrometer uses AI to transform the process of building methods, data acquisition management and data processing for interpretation and planning next steps

context_claims.claim_title: Stellar mass spectrometer with automated intelligence
context_claims.claim_description: Thermo Scientific Stellar mass spectrometer is a first-of-its-kind instrument designed for highly multiplexed targeted quantitation with integrated automated intelligence capabilities.
context_claims.source_quote: the Thermo Scientific Stellar mass spectrometer (MS)—which uses AI to transform the process of building methods, data acquisition management and data processing

context_claims.claim_title: Addressing technology gap in discovery-to-validation workflow
context_claims.claim_description: The AI solution addresses a historical limitation where no single-vendor solutions offered excellent performance for both discovery and targeted verification, impacting researcher productivity.
context_claims.source_quote: Until recently, there were no single-vendor solutions that offered excellent performance for both discovery and targeted verification. This was a serious limitation that impacted how much researchers could rely on AI

context_claims.claim_title: Thermo Fisher Scientific as instrument manufacturer
context_claims.claim_description: Thermo Fisher Scientific manufactures scientific instruments and software for research laboratories, specifically mass spectrometry systems and analytical tools.
context_claims.source_quote: For more information, explore the Stellar MS web page or reach out to your Thermo Fisher Scientific sales representative.

context_claims.claim_title: Recent introduction of automated intelligence capability
context_claims.claim_description: The automated intelligence capabilities on Stellar MS represent a recent advancement, with the technology being newly available as of the blog post publication.
context_claims.source_quote: With the advent of automated intelligence available on Stellar MS to build targeted methods and manage data acquisition, it's a whole new ball game.
